column1: Smoque BBQ////The food here is great! I have had the chopped brisket sandwich
column5: the baby back ribs. All of the meat is super tender. I had the ribs to-go
column6: but they still had the smokey smell when opening the box! The BBQ beans
column8: and cornbread are all really good too. The cornbread has corn kernels inside. The cole slaw is a bit vinegar heavy
